description:
Have you ever been to the gym in January? If so, you know it's packed with people. What about in April? Where did all the people go?

We all know that New Year's Resolutions are thought up with the best intentions but the execution often seems to be lacking. Why is that?

In this course you'll discover 7 steps that will help you achieve your goal. You'll also get to apply those steps to a goal you're working on right now. You will walk away from this course ready to achieve your goal.
title: Achieve Your Goals
